snippet: The three men were arrested in 2012 as they were boarding a flight to a Turkish airport not far from Syria and charged with criminal association with the intent to commit terrorist acts.
abstract: Paris court sentences three men to prison terms of up to five years for trying to join rebellion in Syria, first such convictions in France.
lead_paragraph: The three men were arrested in 2012 as they were boarding a flight to a Turkish airport not far from Syria and charged with criminal association with the intent to commit terrorist acts.

headline.main: French Court Convicts 3 Who Tried to Join Militants in Syria
headline.print_headline: France: 3 Men Convicted for Trying to Join Syria’s War

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
